Lens.comm: Lens compatibility with older Canon lenses.

cont.entity_a: Lens included is very nice. Kit lens is okay for basic use but better lenses recommended. Lens upgrade recommended for better photo quality.
cont.entity_b: Lens has spots inside that show up in pictures. Quality of images depends on the lenses used. Lens bundled is adequate but upgrade suggested.

Durability.comm: Durable and reliable over many years.

cont.entity_b: Dependable and durable for long-term use.

cont.entity_a: Takes excellent high-res digital photos. Comparable picture quality to Nikon D3000. Least digital noise in higher ISO settings. Great quality and easy to use. Excellent picture quality and easy to use. Takes excellent photos, even in low light conditions. Excellent picture quality and easy to use.
cont.entity_b: Produces great pictures even after 10 years. Low noise performance is above average. Excellent picture quality and speed. Good for action and low light conditions. Great for professional-looking photos.

cont.entity_a: Very user-friendly settings. Easy to use with many functions. Easy to understand controls and menu. Very easy to use and takes high-quality photos.
cont.entity_b: Easy to comprehend with professional capabilities. Easy to use and fully automatic when needed.
Battery lasts long. Battery life is excellent. Battery life is amazing.

cont.entity_a: Smaller and lighter than previous models but well constructed. Well-constructed and durable.
cont.entity_b: Camera body has a good feel and is durable. Camera is a bit heavy but well-balanced.

cont.entity_a: Solid Canon quality at a reasonable price. Good balance between price and quality of output.
cont.entity_b: Great value for the price. Impressive feature list with affordable price.

cont.entity_a: Manual controls are comprehensive. Excellent digital camera with many manual settings.
cont.entity_b: Camera has many features and is highly recommended. Some features are outdated but still a solid choice.

cont.entity_a: Perfect starter choice for beginners with more settings than expected. Great camera for hobbyists and semi-pros. Great for beginners with intuitive controls. Great starter SLR camera. Good upgrade from point-and-shoot cameras.
cont.entity_b: Great learning tool for photography. Great camera for beginners and advanced users.

cont.entity_a: Fast picture taking and reduced red-eye.
cont.entity_b: Latency is subsecond, great for action shots. Great for surfing photos with fast motor drive. Takes great action photos with fast autofocus. Great for competitive sports photography.
Flash had issues but was fixed with cleaning. Built-in flash is effective.

cont.entity_a: Preowned but in excellent condition. Pristine condition and as described.

Compatibility.comm: Compatible with existing lenses from older Canon models.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with older Rebel EOS film camera lenses. Camera fits all Canon lenses.
Delivered sooner than estimated. Camera arrived quickly and in good condition.
Small and lightweight, fits well in small hands.

cont.entity_b: Allows for more creativity compared to previous cameras.

cont.entity_a: Sensor failure is expensive to repair.

cont.entity_b: Cord port is broken, requiring additional purchase.
File naming system could be improved.
Lacks true spot metering and has loud mirror slap.
